articles.title: Trump's vow to 'drill baby drill' bodes well for oil? It's more complicated, analysts say
articles.description: Crude oil futures suffered losses amid global cyber outage and concerns about Chinese demand. Another Trump presidency would seek to "drill baby drill" but actual prospect more complicated.
articles.content:
Crude oil futures posted a second straight weekly decline, punctuated by sharp losses Friday as a global cyber outage led to risk-off sentiment across markets and helped lift the dollar.

articles.title: Trump Claims Unfounded Auto Industry Crisis During Milwaukee Rally
articles.description: Donald Trump, during his acceptance speech as the Republican nominee, appealed to swing state autoworkers with unverified claims about Chinese auto plants in Mexico. Trump argued for firing the United Auto Workers president and criticized Biden’s electric vehicle policies. The union and industry experts countered his statements, emphasizing Trump's inaccuracies.
articles.content:
Donald Trump appealed to autoworkers in key swing states, urging them to dismiss their union president through disputed claims about Chinese auto plants in Mexico, during his acceptance speech for the Republican presidential nomination.
